title.narrative: Preservation of the Traditional Baniva Language

description.narrative: UNESCO has identified Baniva as a critical language at risk of extinction. This project involves the compilation of a language dictionary and storybook in conjunction with workshops and activities to support Baniva communities in their efforts to pass their language and culture down to their children.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles
